meanings.definition: Hoverflies: small, fast-flying insects with yellow and black markings
meanings.sent1: The hoverflies buzzed around the garden, their yellow and black colors shining in the sun.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of hoverflies near the flowers, moving quickly from one bloom to another.
meanings.sent3: The hoverflies had a race to see who could reach the end of the garden first.
meanings.sent4: The field was alive with hoverflies, creating a vibrant dance in the air.
meanings.sent5: As the hoverflies darted around, they added a touch of magic to the garden.

meanings.definition: Hoverflies: insects that resemble bees but do not sting
meanings.sent1: My daughter mistook the hoverflies for bees because of their similar appearance.
meanings.sent2: The hoverflies gathered around the blossoms, peacefully coexisting with the bees.
meanings.sent3: The hoverflies decided to throw a party for the bees, complete with tiny hats and music.
meanings.sent4: In the meadow, the hoverflies danced gracefully, mimicking the movements of the bees.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a haven for hoverflies, offering them a safe space away from the stinging bees.
